endpoints.name: Organization Details
endpoints.description: The API retrieves the Organization details, along with the Organization ID, based on the Administrator or SuperAdministrator details, used in the Authtoken. The OrgId parameter in this particular method is optional.

pathParameters.name: Organization Id
pathParameters.description: The unique Zoho Organization Identified for the organization

endpoints.name: Subscription Details
endpoints.description: The API retrieves the Subscription details along with the storage information, with allotted and available storage details for the given organization. The details are available for all users along with their individual allotted storage details.

pathParameters.name: zoid
pathParameters.description: The unique Zoho Organization Identified for the organization

endpoints.name: User Storage
endpoints.description: The API retrieves the details of the available and allotted storage information for the particular user in the given Organization. The details are available for all users along with their individual allotted storage details.

pathParameters.name: zoid
pathParameters.description: The unique Zoho Organization Identified for the organization

pathParameters.name: zuid
pathParameters.description: The unique Zoho User Identifier for the user

pathParameters.name: zoid
pathParameters.description: The unique Zoho Organization Identified for the organization

queryParameters.name: Limit
queryParameters.description: Used to get the Spam listing details of organization in batches,Specify the number of items to be retrieved in each batch.

queryParameters.name: Start
queryParameters.description: Used to get the Spam listing details of organization in batches.Specify the order number from which the data retrieval should start. Works better when used with limit parameter.

queryParameters.name: Spam Category
queryParameters.description: Used to specify the Spam Category of Spam Listing to be retrieved.

endpoints.name: All Domain Details
endpoints.description: Get the details of all the domains in the organization.

pathParameters.name: Organization Id
pathParameters.description: The unique Zoho Organization Identified for the organization

endpoints.name: Single Domain Details
endpoints.description: Get the details of a single domain in the organization.

pathParameters.name: Domain Name

endpoints.name: All groups details
endpoints.description: Get the details of all the groups in the organization

pathParameters.name: zoid
pathParameters.description: The unique Zoho Organization Identified for the organization

queryParameters.name: Search Key
queryParameters.description: To get the details of group, which matches a specific SearchKey, specify the searchKey String in this parameter.

queryParameters.name: Fields
queryParameters.description: By default all fields will be retrieved. To get only specific fields, specify the field names, separated by comma in this parameter.

endpoints.name: Single Group Details
endpoints.description: The API retrieves the details of a particular group based on the GroupId details provided in the request.

pathParameters.name: zoid
pathParameters.description: The unique Zoho Organization Identified for the organization

pathParameters.name: Group Id
pathParameters.description: The unique Identifier for a specific group in the organization.

endpoints.name: Get emails for moderation
endpoints.description: The API retrieves all the emails that are held for moderation in that particular group.

pathParameters.name: zoid
pathParameters.description: The unique Zoho Organization Identified for the organization

pathParameters.name: groupid
pathParameters.description: The identifier to uniquely identify the particular group.

endpoints.name: Get moderation email content
endpoints.description: The API retrieves the content of the email that is held for moderation, based on the Mesaage ID.

pathParameters.name: zoid
pathParameters.description: The unique Zoho Organization Identified for the organization

pathParameters.name: Group Id
pathParameters.description: The unique Identifier for a specific group in the organization.

pathParameters.name: Message Id
pathParameters.description: The specific messageId of the email held for moderation, to whose content should be retrieved.

endpoints.name: User Account Details
endpoints.description: The API retrieves all the user's details for the specified Organization Id when requested by the admin of the organization.

pathParameters.name: zoid
pathParameters.description: The unique Zoho Organization Identified for the organization

endpoints.description: The API retrieves all the user details for the specified zoid, when requested by the admin of the organization.

queryParameters.name: zuid

endpoints.name: User account details
endpoints.description: To get the account details of the user currently authenticated

endpoints.name: Folder Details
endpoints.description: The API retrieves all the folders details for the specified account based on the account ID provided in the Request.

pathParameters.name: Account Id
pathParameters.description: The unique Identifier for a specific account of an user.

endpoints.name: Single Folder Details
endpoints.description: To get the details of a particular folder, based on the Folder Id provided.

pathParameters.name: Account Id
pathParameters.description: The unique Identifier for a specific account of an user.

pathParameters.name: Folder Id
pathParameters.description: The unique Identifier for a specific folder in the user account.

endpoints.name: Label Details
endpoints.description: To get the details of the labels in the account, along with the Label Id details.

pathParameters.name: Account Id
pathParameters.description: The unique Identifier for a specific account of an user.

endpoints.name: Single Label Details
endpoints.description: To get the details of a particular folder, based on the Folder Id provided.

pathParameters.name: Account Id
pathParameters.description: The unique Identifier for a specific account of an user.

pathParameters.name: Label Id
pathParameters.description: The unique Identifier for a specific label in the user account.

endpoints.name: List of emails in a folder
endpoints.description: To get the details of all or specific set of emails in a folder based on view options.

pathParameters.name: Account Id
pathParameters.description: The unique Identifier for a specific account of an user.

queryParameters.name: Folder Id
queryParameters.description: Folder Id of the folder for which the emails need to be retrieved.

queryParameters.name: Status
queryParameters.description: To retrieve emails by status. to retrieve only read emails or unread emails.

queryParameters.name: Flag Id
queryParameters.description: To retrieve emails based on a specific flag.

queryParameters.name: Label Id
queryParameters.description: To retrieve emails based on a specific label.

queryParameters.name: Sort By
queryParameters.description: The list of emails can be sort by date, messageid or size. The default sort order is date.

queryParameters.name: Sort Order
queryParameters.description: The sort order of the retrieved list, whether ascending or descending need to be specified here. The allowed values are truefor ascending and false for descending.

queryParameters.name: Include To
queryParameters.description: Whether the To details need to be included or not.

queryParameters.name: Include Archive
queryParameters.description: Whether the Archived emails need to be included or not on the list of emails retrieved.

queryParameters.name: Include Sent
queryParameters.description: Whether Sent emails need to be included or not on the list of emails retrieved.

queryParameters.name: Fields
queryParameters.description: The list of fields that need to included in the retrieved list or not.

queryParameters.name: Attached Mails
queryParameters.description: To retrieve only the emails with attachments.

queryParameters.name: Inlined Mails
queryParameters.description: To retrieve only the emails with inlines.

queryParameters.name: Flagged Mails
queryParameters.description: To retrieve only flagged emails.

queryParameters.name: Responded Mails
queryParameters.description: To retrieve only replied emails.

queryParameters.name: Threaded Mails
queryParameters.description: To retrieve emails that are a part of conversations.

queryParameters.name: Start
queryParameters.description: The start sequence number of the emails to be retrieved, to retrieve a specific set of emails. The default value is 1.

queryParameters.name: Limit
queryParameters.description: The number of emails to be retrieved from the start value mentioned. The default value is 10.

endpoints.name: List Search Results
endpoints.description: To get the list of emails, from the account based on custom search conditions.

pathParameters.name: Account Id
pathParameters.description: The unique Identifier for a specific account of an user.

queryParameters.name: Sort By
queryParameters.description: The list of emails can be sort by date, messageid or size. The default sort order is date.

queryParameters.name: Fields
queryParameters.description: The list of fields that need to included in the retrieved list or not.

queryParameters.name: Include To
queryParameters.description: Whether the To details need to be included or not.

queryParameters.name: Received Time
queryParameters.description: By default, the value is before 2 minutes.

queryParameters.name: Search Key
queryParameters.description: To search for new emails, provide the searchKey as newMails.The custom Search Key built using the Search Syntax defined in this help page.

queryParameters.name: Start
queryParameters.description: The start sequence number of the emails to be retrieved, to retrieve a specific set of emails. The default value is 1.

queryParameters.name: Limit
queryParameters.description: The number of emails to be retrieved from the start value mentioned. The default value is 10.

pathParameters.name: Message Id

pathParameters.name: Folder Id

pathParameters.name: Message Id

endpoints.description: The API is used to get the content stream of the attachments in an email. In case there are multiple attachments, the user needs to use the api for each attachment with respective details.

pathParameters.name: Folder Id
pathParameters.description: The unique identification number associated with the folder.

pathParameters.name: Message Id
pathParameters.description: The unique Message ID associated with the particular email.

pathParameters.name: Attachment Id
pathParameters.description: The attachment id of the particular attachment.

endpoints.name: Get email content

pathParameters.name: Account Id
pathParameters.description: The unique Zoho Account number associated with the particular account.

pathParameters.name: Folder Id
pathParameters.description: The unique identification number associated with the folder.

pathParameters.name: Message Id
pathParameters.description: The unique Message ID associated with the particular email.
